summary.Title: Administrative assistant
summary.Presentation:
Do you want to work in the greenenergy business? Then join Disruptive Biotrading in Aarhus.
 
Your most important working tasks
On daily basis

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to work in the greenenergy business? Then join Disruptive Biotrading in Aarhus.

 

Your most important working tasks

On daily basis you will assist our logistics department and make invoices and logistics run smooth through our systems.

You will also assist our CEO with various administrative working tasks, as calendar planning, bookings and contracts.

 

About you

You have experience with office administration and logistics, and you are generally good with numbers. You have a natural desire to bring order to your working tasks.

In your role you will assist other employees and you see yourself more as a team player than an individualist.

It is important that you can handle periods with changing priorities and working tasks from day to day, as it can be the nature of business in the trading world.

Our working language is both Danish and English and you must be able to communicate professionally on both languages.

 

What we offer

We offer a full-time position with a fixed monthly salary. You will be working with our team in Hasselager, Aarhus where we moved our office and operations in November 2021.

You will become a part of a newly founded company with a high growth rate and a buzzing international working environment.


About us

We trade in bio products, that we especially source for production of biogas and biodiesel in Europe. We are currently a team of 6 dedicated people. See much more on our website.

 

Apply

Email us your CV and a few words about yourself.

If you have questions regarding the job, please contact

CEO Nicki Dalgaard on:

M: +45 93 93 36 30

E: Nicki@Disruptivebiotrading.com

We ongoing invite fitting candidates to a job interview.

Start: As soon as possible. 

We look forward to hearing from you!
